flawed_nl_solution:
Jake weighs 8kg more than 52 kg which is 8+52 = <<8+52=64>>64 kg
Tracy and Jake together weigh 64+52 = <<64+52=116>>116kg
John therefore weighs 158-116 = <<158-116=42>>42 kg
The range of their weights is 64-42 = <<64-42=22>>22kg
#### 22

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 64. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
